data.comment: The match has started, with Juventus kicking-off.
Spezia's M'bala Nzola is whistled for offside at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 3, Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
Rosario Abisso signals a Juventus throw-in in Spezia's half.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
Juventus's Alvaro Morata breaks free at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Spezia have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Spezia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Juventus at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 11, Paulo Dybala of Juventus is pulled up for offside.
Free kick Juventus.
Rosario Abisso awards Spezia a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Alvaro Morata puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Weston McKennie.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 18, Juventus's Federico Chiesa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Throw-in Spezia.
In the minute 21, In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Spezia close to the penalty box.
Juventus drive forward but Alvaro Morata is judged offside.
In the minute 25, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Spezia's Matteo Ricci is on target but unsuccessful.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico Chiesa (Juventus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 30, Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Matteo Ricci for Spezia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
In the minute 32, Goal! Tommaso Pobega equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Paolo Bartolomei to set up the goal.
In La Spezia Spezia attack through M'bala Nzola. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 37, M'bala Nzola is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Rosario Abisso awards the home team a throw-in.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 40, M'bala Nzola is back on his feet again.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Spezia push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Tommaso Pobega gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Juventus defence.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 45, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Spezia have a goal kick.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in La Spezia.
Spezia kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Juventus.
It's a goal kick for the home team in La Spezia.
Kevin Agudelo is on a sub for Daniele Verde for Spezia.
Free kick Juventus.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Juventus in the half of Spezia.
Julian Chabot is booked for the home team.
Simone Bastoni (Spezia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
In the minute 52, In La Spezia Spezia attack through Paolo Bartolomei. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Paolo Bartolomei (Spezia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Spezia's area.
In the minute 56, Weston McKennie for the away team is judged to be offside.
The away team have replaced Paulo Dybala with Cristiano Ronaldo. This is the first substitution made today by Andrea Pirlo.
Rosario Abisso awards Juventus a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo gives Juventus a 1-2 lead in La Spezia.
Alvaro Morata with an assist there.
In La Spezia, Diego Farias (Spezia) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Spezia needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Juventus make their second substitution with Aaron Ramsey replacing Weston McKennie.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Rodrigo Bentancur with Adrien Rabiot.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo has run offside.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
In the minute 64, Kevin Agudelo for Spezia is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Juventus at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Juventus.
In the minute 67, Goal! Adrien Rabiot extends Juventus's lead to 1-3.
Federico Chiesa instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 69, In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Adrien Rabiot for Juventus has been booked by Rosario Abisso and receives a first yellow card.
Rosario Abisso awards Juventus a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Paolo Bartolomei for Spezia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Spezia drive upfield and Diego Farias gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 73, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Spezia surge into the attack at Stadio Alberto Picco but Claudio Terziâ€™s header is off-target.
Juventus have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Emmanuel Gyasi is replacing Diego Farias for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a third substitution, with Cristian Dell`Orco replacing Julian Chabot.
Nahuel Estevez is replacing Tommaso Pobega for the home team.
Juventus have been awarded a penalty in La Spezia...
Spezia's Paolo Bartolomei has been booked in La Spezia.
In the minute 76, Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo extends Juventus's lead from the spot. They now lead 1-4.
Andrea Pirlo is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Gianluca Frabotta replacing Leonardo Bonucci.
The away team replace Alvaro Morata with Dejan Kulusevski.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Juventus.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Juventus.
Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
M'bala Nzola of Spezia is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Spezia are coming forward and Simone Bastoni gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 87, At Stadio Alberto Picco, Nahuel Estevez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In La Spezia Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
Ardian Ismajli is replacing Claudio Terzi for the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in La Spezia.
Spezia drive upfield and Ardian Ismajli gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juventus defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in La Spezia.
Spezia's Nahuel Estevez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Juventus.
Spezia's Nahuel Estevez misses with an attempt on goal.
Rosario Abisso awards Juventus a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-4.
